dct_description_sm: Scale approximately 1:2,090,000--(W 8째06'00'--W 0째19'00'/N 59째21'00'--N 54째51'00')  ; Gule Hole sculp. ; Scale statement reads 'Miliaria Scotica' 28 = 21 mm. ; Relief shown pictorially. ; Shows settlements with and without churches, place names, lochs (shaded), rivers and tributaries, boundary Scotland-England. ; At top right corner ornate cartouche enclosing the title and, attached to it, an ornate scale cartouche with the scale statement. ; Decoration: elaborated compass rose with direction lines, ship, sea monster, shaded coasts (outwards) and sea detail (stippled). ; Issued for inclusion in Camden's 'Britannia' in 1607 and subsequent editions.
